title: Load Property Listings within 3 Seconds
description: Verify that the initial load of property listings on the homepage completes within 3 seconds under normal network conditions.

steps.description: Navigate to the portal homepage
Measure page load time and confirm it is under 3 seconds
Ensure featured property listings are fully loaded and displayed

title: Advanced Search Returns Accurate Results
description: Verify the search functionality returns correct and relevant properties based on multiple filter criteria and location inputs, including map integration.

steps.description: Navigate to the advanced search page
Apply multiple filters including property type, price range, bedrooms, bathrooms, and amenities
Enter valid location information using address autocomplete
Use interactive map to refine search area
Submit search query
Verify search results match the filter criteria and location specified
Ensure map markers correspond to properties in the search results

title: AI-Generated Titles and Descriptions Produce Contextual Content
description: Check that property titles and descriptions generated by the integrated AI are contextually relevant and accurate based on input property data.

steps.description: Start property publication journey and input valid property details
Trigger AI content generation for title and description
Verify generated title and description are relevant to provided property features
Ensure text is coherent and follows language rules for selected locale

title: Admin Authentication with Role-Based Access Control
description: Verify that admin users can securely log in with correct credentials and their access is properly restricted according to roles.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page
Enter valid admin credentials
Submit login form
Confirm login is successful and session is established
Check that admin dashboard and features are available according to user role
Logout from admin session
Verify session is cleared and access to admin pages is denied post logout

title: Reject Upload of Unsupported Media Formats or Oversize Files
description: Ensure the system rejects media uploads with unsupported formats or files exceeding allowed size limits with proper user feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to the media upload section during property publication
Attempt to upload unsupported media file formats (e.g., .exe, .txt)
Confirm upload is rejected with informative error message
Attempt to upload valid format files exceeding size limits
Confirm upload is rejected with size warning and no upload occurs
Upload supported media files within size constraints
Confirm upload is successful and media is previewable

title: Geolocation and Map Features Display Correct Coordinates
description: Verify that the Google Maps integration correctly autocompletes addresses, geocodes locations, and displays user and property coordinates accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to search and publication pages with geolocation features
Input partial and full addresses using autocomplete field
Confirm address suggestions are relevant and accurate
Select a suggested address
Verify map moves to correct geocoded location with marker
Enable browser geolocation permission
Confirm user's actual coordinates are displayed on the map
Simulate geolocation error or denial
Ensure geolocation error modal is shown with corrective instructions

title: Multi-Language Support Switches UI Text and Content Correctly
description: Verify UI text, messages, and property content switch seamlessly among Portuguese, English, and Spanish languages.

steps.description: Open the portal homepage
Switch language setting to Portuguese
Check all UI elements display Portuguese text correctly
Switch language setting to English
Check all UI elements display English text correctly
Switch language setting to Spanish
Check all UI elements display Spanish text correctly
Navigate through core pages ensuring content and placeholders update accordingly

title: Accessibility Compliance with Keyboard Navigation and Screen Reader Support
description: Validate that the portal UI meets accessibility standards, including full keyboard navigation, screen reader labels, and proper color contrast.

steps.description: Navigate through the portal using keyboard only (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, Space)
Ensure all interactive elements are reachable and focus states are visible
Activate screen reader and navigate pages
Confirm proper ARIA labels and roles announce UI elements and states accurately
Use accessibility tools to check color contrast ratios on key UI components
Verify contrast ratio meets WCAG AA standards or higher

title: Session Persistence and Encrypted Passwords with HTTPS Communication
description: Verify user sessions persist securely and admin/user passwords are stored using bcrypt with all communications protected via HTTPS.

steps.description: Login with valid user/admin credentials
Verify session token persists after page reloads and browser restarts
Inspect password storage in database or backend service
Confirm passwords are hashed using bcrypt, never stored in plaintext
Monitor network traffic during authentication and other sensitive data exchanges
Ensure all data transmissions are encrypted using HTTPS protocol

title: Complete Property Publication Journey with All Validations
description: Test the entire multi-step property publication process including AI-generated content, media uploads with validation, data verification, and final submission.

steps.description: Navigate to property publish section and start new listing journey
Fill required fields such as property type, location, features
Use AI feature to generate property title and description
Check AI-generated content is displayed and accepted
Upload valid images and videos, verifying size and format constraints
Confirm media uploads are successful and previews load properly
Submit the publication form
Validate all data, confirm no missing required fields or invalid info
Check property is persisted and listed as published in the system

title: Admin Property Management With Filters and Sorting
description: Verify admin users can view, filter, sort, and manage property listings efficiently in the admin dashboard.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to property management page
Apply filters by property status, type, price range, and date
Confirm property list updates correctly to match active filters
Sort property listings by date, price, and size
Verify properties are ordered as expected after sort
Perform bulk and individual actions like approve, reject, edit, delete
Ensure actions complete successfully with UI feedback and state updates

title: UI Components Render Correctly with Responsive Layout
description: Verify that reusable UI components such as modals, forms, headers, and icons render correctly and adapt responsively across devices.

steps.description: Load main pages and UI components on desktop viewport
Verify components are displayed correctly with proper spacing and alignment
Resize window or use device emulation for tablet and mobile sizes
Ensure responsive layouts adjust components gracefully without breakage
Interact with UI modals (login, contact, confirmation) and verify correct display and closing behavior

title: Address Autocomplete Handles Invalid or Partial Inputs Gracefully
description: Verify the Google Maps address autocomplete field responds properly to invalid, incomplete, or edge-case user inputs, providing suggestions or error handling.

steps.description: Enter partial or malformed address text into autocomplete field
Confirm autocomplete shows relevant suggestions or informs no matches found
Input invalid characters or blank input
Check that input does not cause system crashes and user is notified appropriately
Select a suggestion and verify map updates location correctly

title: Published Property Details Display All Relevant Information
description: Validate that detailed property pages show complete and accurate information including image galleries, videos, descriptions, features, and agent contact details.

steps.description: Navigate to a published property detail page from search or listing
Verify image and video galleries load and are navigable
Check property descriptions and AI-generated content are visible and correct
Validate presence and accuracy of property features (bedrooms, bathrooms, area, amenities)
Confirm agent contact information is displayed and functional (e.g., contact modals, links)

title: User Login Session Persists and Logout Clears Session
description: Verify end-users can log in, their session persists across navigation and browser reloads, and logout properly clears session data.

steps.description: Navigate to login modal and enter valid user credentials
Submit login and verify successful authentication
Ensure user session persists after page reloads and navigating to other pages
Perform logout action
Confirm session is cleared and user is redirected or logged out properly
Attempt to access authenticated-only pages after logout
Verify access is denied and login is required again
